com.st.BlueSTSDK

Class Debug

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.st.BlueSTSDK.Debug

  • public class Debug
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used for write and read from the debug console

    • Nested Class Summary

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  Debug.DebugOutputListener
      Interface used for notify to the user the console activity

      • write

        public void write(java.lang.String message)
        write a message to the stdIn of the debug console

      • setDebugOutputListener

        public void setDebugOutputListener(Debug.DebugOutputListener listener)
        set the output listener, only one listener can be set in this class

        If the listener is null we stop the notification

        Parameters:
        listener - class with the callback when something appear in the debug console
